hYDRAS:

Hidras laugthed "So, do you whant to get your old decepticon form?"






--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, EmprzAnastazia@a... wrote:
> In a message dated 2/10/03 5:16:18 PM Central Standard Time, 
> airly2002@h... writes:
> 
> 
> > "Alpha TRion?????"said Hydras with anger "so do you are an 
AUTOBOT?"
> > 
> Jumping to conclusions, wasn't he? she thought to herself. 
> 
> A dry soft laugh, "Hardly. As I said, I am a Decepticon." 
Narrowing her 
> optics slightly, keeping them upon him. "If my information about 
you was 
> correct, then that Megatron & Galvatron side of you would know who 
I am."
> 
> "Alpha Trion must have reactivated me for some reason. I was in a 
stasis lock 
> on Cybertron in the Decepticon Crypt. Restored & reformated into 
this," 
> moving her forearms & glancing at her form, "pathetic trans-
organic form. 
> Alpha Trion refused to give me back my form. When I was in search 
of 
> materials to rebuild my own form the hard way, I was discovered by 
those who 
> call themselves Tripredicus. Hardly worthy transformers. From 
there, I 
> escaped in a shuttle." she held back the fact that there were 
materials in 
> the shuttle, which Wheeljack was using to rebuild her form.
